title: Highliting does not work for wildcard searches when hl.useFastVectorHighlighter is enabled
description:
Highlighting is not working for wildcard searches when TermVectors (hl.useFastVectorHighlighter) is enabled.
I wanted to use FastVectorHighlighter to improve the performance of search results but when hl.useFastVectorHighlighter is enabled highlighting does not work in case of wildcard search

comments.author: Koji Sekiguchi
comments.content:
Hi Shyam, thank you for your interest to FVH!

This issue is a duplicate of LUCENE-1889 and it's been already fixed. You can use FVH for wildcard query with the coming 3.5.
